Thank you for your room reservation request! We’ll respond to your request within 48 hours during our normal business hours Monday through Friday, 8:00am to 5:00pm. If you don’t hear from us by that time, or if you have any questions, please contact room booking coordinator, Stephanie Crooks, at 434-243-8788 or sac3m@virginia.edu.
